name: Rumble Road
description:
Rumble Road: The Road for Rumbling.

Dethrone the blob court!

Decimate the skele-army!

Face down the mysterious evil at the end of the road!

Can you lead the buddies to victory?

Controls:

W/S: change selection

Z: select

X: cancel

M: mute

P: swap palette

Gamepads are also supported!

Post-jam updates:

v1.1: 1-to-1 scalemode, keyboard events captured to prevent scrolling

For the best experience, play on Chrome or Firefox.

Made for #GBJAM 5 with Pixi.js.
